name: Magnificent 13th Century Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
Located just 45 minutes from Paris, the Château, surrounded by its ramparts more than 800 years old, welcomes you and your guests for D-Day. This exceptional place, a real treasure of heritage, will be the ideal place for a private reception. It is the perfect location to celebrate an intimate and unique wedding. In a green setting receive your guests for moments of sharing and love. This 6,000m2 castle dating from the 13th century is located in a 250 hectare private park. It has kept its medieval era features but is equipped with all the latest technology and amenities. Completely renovated, each room of the property retraces the history of France from the Middle Ages to the Revolution.
There is a magnificent 600m2 orangery that allows you to receive up to 450 guests. The castle has 20 bedrooms including 13 suites and with period decoration, they will take you back in time while promising comfort and luxury. There is also a listed chapel, a bakery, 3 kitchens including one professional, a medieval tea room, a wine and tasting cellar, a 10 hectare landscaped garden, a theatre/cinema with a stage and a giant screen (seats 25), a tennis court, unique facilities for sports and relaxation (5 massage rooms, an indoor swimming pool)...
The four-poster beds and the bathrooms have different styles all in harmony. It is possible to celebrate your secular ceremony in the wooded park, at the water lily, a romantic place of great beauty.
Take advantage of your stay at the Château to relax at the Spa, with swimming pool and hammam, for a few moments of well-being during this weekend full of euphoria and varied emotions. The whole team of the castle is at your disposal to make this great day a success!
CONDITIONS:
No time and music limit
Many parking spots
RATES:
Rental of the Orangery (capacity - 450 people seated, 1000 people standing, 600 m2) for an evening event: 16 875€ tax included.
Includes:
Indoor furniture for 300 people (up to 100 additional seats (table + chair): 10€ /seat
Light equipment
Fully equipped area for caterer
Fully equipped cloakroom for 400 people (excluding staff)
Possibility to hold a cocktail in the castle’s courtyard
Cleaning of the Orangery
The presence of a security guard for first 150 people (500€ supplement per guard for every 150 people)
Rental of the Orangery or "Salon des Rois"(max 80 people seated) the day after for a brunch: 6 250€ tax included.
Brunch the day after on the terraces of the pool (with access to the pool with a limited number of people): 7 500€ tax included.
Accomodation for 1 night:
15 suites of the castle (32pax) : 18 750€ tax included
Rental of an annex of the domain (Pavillon du Cerf -nuptial suite): 625€ tax included
Rental of an annex of the domain (Colombier - 15pax): 1 500€ tax included
Rental of a guest house, 400m away (Bouville - 15pax): 1 500€ tax included
Rental of a guest house, 1km away (Clos du gatinais - 30pax): 3 000€ tax included
Services included: daily housekeeping, linens.
Services available upon request: access to the chapel for the ceremony, caterer, sommelier, babysitter, extra housekeeping, picnic baskets, barbecue, luxury car with chauffeur...
Wedding planer service: 2 790€ tax included.
Coordination on site for D-Day: 1 690€ tax included.
Activities:
On site: billiards, pinball machine, pétanque, tennis, table tennis, hammam, spa, jacuzzi, meditation room, gym, wine tastings, nightclub, cinema, 2 ponies.
Upon request: gym, yoga, pilates and cooking classes, massages in one of the 5 spa cabins, beauty treatments, children’s workshops, musicians, bread making classes, guided sightseeing tours, shows, tastings…
In the immediate vicinity: golf, guided walking or e-bike tours, riding center, go-karting, boat outings on the Seine, archery, hot air balloons…
Access:
Orly Airport (45 minutes) /Charles de Gaulle Airport (1h30)
RER Paris (30 minutes)
additional_info:
